PluginData.Tooltip: Terminal UI improvements: Group renaming, block filter, show default block names.

Terminal UI improvements - Group renaming - Block filter - Show default block names
For more information please see the plugin's GitHub page: https://github.com/viktor-ferenczi/se-better-terminal
